<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Master of the Dead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3491) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 35</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175)

**Prerequisites**
[Deathly Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3487)

</column>

---

You have reached the pinnacle of the reanimator's craft: the ability to raise nearly any corpse or skeleton as a gruesome mockery of the creature it once was. You learn the [_shambling horror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1105) focus spell. Your focus pool increases by 1 Focus Point.
name: Master of the Dead
